data.feedback: Comprehensive plan covering all 9 Flutter epics with correct backend API integration. All referenced files verified to exist, all files to create verified as new. Minor issues with duplicate dependencies in arrays.
issues: Duplicate dependencies in epic-ui-foundation and epic-native-integration arrays
Inconsistent executionOrder values (multiple epics with order: 2)
Firebase config files (google-services.json, GoogleService-Info.plist) require Firebase Console setup
suggestions: Clean up duplicate entries in dependencies arrays
Assign distinct executionOrder values for clearer sequencing
Add note that Firebase files require Firebase project setup before creation
